title: Indigenous Youth Self-Expression and Educational Leadership Development in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Digital Media Literacy, Understanding Sociological Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment emphasizing smartphone-based digital content creation.

learning_goals: Learners can construct a framework for analyzing digital self-expression cases of Indigenous youth.
Learners design community-linked digital storytelling projects using smartphone-based tools.
Learners develop learner-teacher role-switching strategies through transformative praxis models in educational settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
